fields.name: LPO_Confirmation_Message
fields.fieldText:
The selected records have been added to the Opportunity.


Click Finish to navigate to the Opportunity Product list and click Edit Products to modify the details.

fields.name: LPO_No_Product_Message
fields.fieldText: No Product has been selected. Please select at least one product from the list.
